children.description: The name of the icon font ligature.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

color.description: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

fontSize.description: The fontSize applied to the icon. Defaults to 24px, but can be configure to inherit font size.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.colorPrimary: Styles applied to the root element if `color="primary"`.
descriptions.colorSecondary: Styles applied to the root element if `color="secondary"`.
descriptions.colorAction: Styles applied to the root element if `color="action"`.
descriptions.colorError: Styles applied to the root element if `color="error"`.
descriptions.colorDisabled: Styles applied to the root element if `color="disabled"`.
descriptions.fontSizeInherit: Styles applied to the root element if `fontSize="inherit"`.
descriptions.fontSizeSmall: Styles applied to the root element if `fontSize="small"`.
descriptions.fontSizeLarge: Styles applied to the root element if `fontSize="large"`.
